
snap(0,0,0)

sky(190,205,255)
fog(200,215,255)
ground(225,185,120)

fadefrom(13865)

name(Mt. Madness!)

nlaps(100)

.maxr(2,800,0)
.maxl(2,-800,0)

set(30,0,10000,250,0)

set(67,0,20000,250,0)p
set(67,2000,22000,250,40)p
set(67,0,18000,250,130)p
set(67,-2000,20000,250,20)p
set(67,0,20000,250,180)p
set(67,0,20000,250,60)p
set(67,2000,23000,250,90)p
set(67,-2000,22000,250,-90)p
set(67,-1000,19000,250,90)p
set(67,1000,19000,250,187)p
set(67,-1000,19000,250,180)p
set(67,1000,21000,250,80)p
set(67,0,23000,250,-135)p


chk(30,0,20000,250,0)p
set(30,0,20000,250,0)p
